column2: It is time to make a decision about the upcoming raid.
We will go across the sea!
You will prepare boats, and go across the sea into the unknown. Select target by right clicking the desired target county title.
You will go pillaging a random settlement.
This county will be the target for your raid.
I need to decide how big the raid should be.
You take half of your men and boats. The rest should stay home and protect the realm.
Strange ships were spoted near the coast. They could be raiders...
You send scouts to the coast, to monitor the invaders.
We are nearing our target. They've probably spotted us already. It's not goint to help them much.
You try to pillage the city.
You try to pillage the temple.
I can't belive this. My scouts report that raiders are attacking defenseless peasants!
Your troops go after the raiders.
A messenger has arrived from our city holding. It appears the raiders are preparing an attack.
Your troops go after the raiders.
Cursed infidels are attacking our religion!
We must defend the temple, at all cost!
Your troops go after the raiders.
Who cares about a few priests?
Those raiders are brave, I'll give them that. They're attacking our main holding!
I need to get out of here!
The enemy has spotted us, they're sending reinforcemnts!
You pillage quickly and run to your boats.
The enemy should have spotted us already, I guess they don't care.
Their weak leader ran, and their morale is low. This was a very good idea!
You attack and pillage enemy holding.
You took all you can carry and you got just in time to your boats, with enemy arrows right behind you.
The raiders got back to their boats. They didn't take much, and hopefully they will leave you alone in the future.
The raid is over. You board the boats, and leave. This was a great adventure!
I should do this more often!
You arrive home, and everyone is happy to see you. Or are they happy to see the loot you've brought?
The raiders took loses, but they've managed to escape.
We took some loses, but we got away from the battle and head to the boats.
You and your warriors will follow the mountains until you reach a sizeable settlement.
Go along the shore on our mighty boats!
You take your fleet along the shore until you find a good target.
You will march across the plains in an atempt to find something worth looting.
After a few days of travel, your scouts report a large village in the distance. You should decide whether you'll attack now, or wait for the cover of darkness.
